website_summaries.verdict: This petite organizer is ideal for parents looking to save stroller space and a few dollars.
pros: Small Velcro attachments fit any stroller
Comes with two insulated drink holders and a large insulated, waterproof compartment
Zipper pocket inside bag for valuables
cons: Cup holders tend to run a little small
Some customers had issues with the product's durability

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Mountain Buggy Duet!!
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these from our first baby and used on a single stroller. It's lasted 2 years and still going :) So when we had another baby and got a double stroller, I started looking at new organizers and then realized this one fits PERFECTLY on half the Mountain Buggy Duet! Bought a second Diono organizer and now we're in business :) And I love having it on the stroller frame vs. handlebar - looks cleaner and we have more room for pushing the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Sagra

customer_reviews.title: Completes my jogging stroller
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go along with my Graco Fast Action Jogging Stroller. The cup holders, phone holder and plastic compartment on my stroller were all way too small for my stuff. This organizer straps on perfectly to my handlebars and flexes to fit a large variety of tumblers, cups and water bottles. It has a zipper that I use for my keys and is deep enough to hold my phone, wallet and other crap without falling out. I regularly fold up my stroller in and out of the trunk and this bends and folds just fine. I never have to take it off. It's seriously the best. This $5 item has made me love my stroller again!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and isn’t damaged when folded
customer_reviews.text: Waited for the price to drop to get this little guy. I have a really big, nice stroller that cane with a huge caddy (BOB), but I really needed a small caddy for my tiny travel stroller that wouldn’t get in the way or damaged when I folded the stroller up really small for our plane rides. This fit the ticket perfectly and it lives in my car with my tiny travel stroller! It can hold my s’well bottles but not my large 32oz Yeti. Holds a Starbucks cup great! I usually stick phone, keys and a drink or two into it and it’s held up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Carville

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I got this when I realized my phone was too big to fit in the little cubby on my stroller. This works great for that, I don’t know how useful the cup holders really are, I wish they connected at the bottom to put smaller items like chapstick etc in. Since it is not connected these items end up in the middle section and can or hard to find if other items are in there . I also wish it had a bigger zipper pocket. I mostly use it to keep my phone in while we go on walks, and to store my earbuds, tissues and a headband in when we aren’t.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The price for something so sturdy was shocking. Honestly, I love it and so glad I bought it. With the virus happening and $ being tight, I opted for this one. Iam very pleased. It's better than my $20 one. The only downside is the top seam seems to have a metal bar going around which is good because keeps the product intact and from getting collapsed but its also its downside when you close an umbrella stroller. you need to un-velcro one side so that you can close the stroller without damaging the product. I still recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Ely

customer_reviews.title: Straps broke after 5 days
customer_reviews.text: I expect high quality from diono. I have their car seat and stroller. Unfortunately this was incredibly disappointing and the Velcro straps were ripping off after 2 days of use. By day 5 it was unusable. It’s cheap and I guess I’d say you get what you pay for, but I just expected more from diono. The cup holders are snug which I actually liked. I usually have a drink in a 20oz reusable cup with me and it kept it secure, no spills. The material is what you’d expect from diono. Feels sturdy. It’s a little on the small side. Pretty sad it just didn’t hold up. Such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Dove

customer_reviews.title: HANDS DOWN WOULD BUY AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my art easel didn't have a place to put my paintbrushes. I bought this since I saw another reviewer use it to hold her water bottle and keys for the gym. I LOVE IT! It works amazingly and is at a fantastic price! I have recommended it to several people in real life. It is so handy. The straps are long enough to attach to a multitude of items. It can hold all fifteen paintbrushes, seven tubes of paint, my rags, and a water dish with more room to spare. It also feels very sturdy. It has not fallen off the skinny metal poles of my easel yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: I've looked at the reviews and some of these seem to have subpar craftsmanship. The one we got is a solid work horse. It lived thru two weeks in Florida for a family vacation and a week at Disney. We crammed everything under the sun in this thing, never an issue. The velcro is very strong, it collapses easily when removed (we used it on a Uppa umbrella stroller ) If you get a faulty one, just return it to Amazon and get a replacement. This is about $25 cheaper then other similar items..Its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: Strap ripped after a couple months of use. Bought it again and it happened again!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was great but it broke after just a couple of months of light use on my Uppababy Vista stroller. It was a little tricky to put on but then it worked great to hold coffee and other items since that stroller doesn’t come with a cup holder. Would have been great but one of the straps ripped Update: I bought this item again thinking I must have received a faulty one previously since the strap ripped off. After just a couple of months, the same thing happened! I only ever put my phone and my child’s sippy cup in this.
customer_reviews.author: Katie N

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This caddy was a lifesaver while at Disney world. It is very sturdy and holds decent size cups/bottles/drinks in the cup holders and 1-2 more can easily be held in the center part. Perfect place to throw our phones and other miscellaneous stuff that we wanted easy access to without having to dig through a backpack. I did have a little trouble with the straps sliding down the side of the stroller but I tied a bandana just under where I wanted it to sit and it worked like a charm. Also helped us locate our stroller a little easier with the bright colored bandana.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have a Baby Jogger City Mini GT and bought this for my keys, phone and drink. It’s not bad, especially for the very low price. A couple things annoy me about it, the drink elastic is pretty small. A large fast food cup kind of tilts over to the middle. It will fit in the center though but isn’t stable. The other thing I don’t like is that it slides around on the handle. The Velcro doesn’t hold it in place very well. I have to reposition it constantly. It might just be my stroller handle. I’ll deal with it though bc I don’t know of those things will be any better with a more expensive caddy.
customer_reviews.author: John & Erika

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Cheap. Convenient.
customer_reviews.text: After spending a lot on a dog stroller for my senior doxie, I didn’t want an expensive organizer. Just something that would hold my drink, phone, remote, keys, mini-flashlight, poop bags, and wipes. This literally fits all these items with room for a few more things. The velcro strao is longer than expected which allows it accommodate different widths & positioning. It’s pretty straightforward & simple, looks nice too & well made. For the price you can’t go wrong. Oh! The bottom is weighted to give it structure & keep its form...I wasn’t expecting that. Cheap it is not.
customer_reviews.author: StyxxsMom

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my indoor bike!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon didn't say I couldn't use this in my indoor bike!!! Too many manufactures make cardio equipment without water bottle holders and I'm not sure why. I placed this behind my seat it fits perfectly to hold a water bottle, my workout headphones, and a hat basically. Doesn't exactly fit on the front of my bike without my knees hitting this. But works great! I'm sure there are many other uses besides a stroller caddy for this. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Brooks_brittany

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is genius! I bought a used BOB Ironman stroller, even tho BOB is supposedly "top of the line" this was a older model that had NO storage whatsoever in the front for the parent. This little buggy buddy was absolutely perfect. My phone laid down nicely, I could put my water bottle, and keys if needed. Its literally so perfect. I will post a picture later. I love this thing and the best part. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: A. Tester

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for! Excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best $6 I ever spent! We needed a little extra storage for our umbrella stroller and It works amazing on our Urbini Reversi Stroller! It has two cup holders but you can easily fit two more cups in the inner pouch. Also it has a zipper pouch on the inside. LOVE it! Minimalist looking but works great! Buy it!! Perfect amount of storage. It’s much better than a shallow tray on most strollers. The only “downside” is that you have to remove it before folding the stroller but it’s not a problem at all because we love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Should’ve bought this a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Chico liteway stroller but the ONLY thing I didn’t like was that I couldn’t put my drinks/water anywhere. For some reason I held off on buying this and finally pulled the trigger and now I wish I would’ve bought it sooner!! Fits perfectly on the stroller even when collapsed. My only wish is that it would have some kind of cover in case it rains. Otherwise it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Arbel

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to stay at Grammy’s for when we visit so I don’t have to worry about packing my primary one for the airplane. This is a great travel size stroller organizer. It is sturdy and fits the essentials. It folds down flat so you can store it easily. The straps are velcro and adjust to any size handle. I like that there is a small zippered compartment on the inside. Can’t beat the price, I just wish the cup pockets were a bit larger (they fit a standard bottle of water).
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: So good, but not sure it will last.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my Mockingbird stroller. I love that it has two cup holders and the zip pocket. I love that the cup holders allow for a degree of insulation. It holds everything I wanted it to and more without being too bulky. The Velcro is sturdy. The ONLY issue I’m starting to see and the only reason I didn’t give this 5 stars is that I can see that the stitch holding the Velcro straps to the main holder is starting to come loose. I have a feeling that the wear and tear will soon have the Velcro break off and I haven’t had it very long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for wagons and families on the go
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2015. Used this on the baby stroller when my son was younger. Now we use it on the back of the wagon for our drinks, snacks and phone. Before we used it on the wagon we attached it to the top bunk bed for my daughters stuff but that didn't last too long because Velcro is fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is perfect. I purchased this to use on the plane ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is perfect. I purchased this to use on the plane (untested thus far), so I’ll update when that trip happens. The bottle pockets do fit our 20oz Hydro Flasks, which was the intended purpose. And there’s a sizable mid-section for other travel odds and ends. It folds down pretty flat and the top has a ridged wiring which allows it to hold its shape. The Velcro straps open completely so you don’t have to loop it around, you can actually wrap it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect small organizer, just what we were looking for. It's very sturdy (not floppy) and fits on our Mountain Buggy Terrain stroller without interfering with the existing cup holders. Great value for money!
customer_reviews.author: La Portuguesa

customer_reviews.title: All I needed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a stroller organizer that could hold my water bottle and phone as the city mini GT does not come with a cup holder or extra compartments. I looked at the more expensive options but am so glad I didn't waste $30 when this one does the trick. This does not have enough space to replace your diaper bag but is great to store a water bottle, phone, and car key when going on a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great for double strollers too
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these for my double stroller, since I was having no luck finding decent cup holders. They are perfect, way better then the one I had that cost 3x as much. Fit two cups comfortably and you can throw all kinds of stuff in the middle pockets. The only thing that would make these absolutely perfect, would be if the cell phone pocket was a little bigger. It won’t fit my iPhone 8 Plus, but I don’t ever leave my phone in my stroller anyway so it doesn’t bother me that much.
customer_reviews.author: Momof5

customer_reviews.title: Aftermarket add on feel stroller storage.
customer_reviews.text: This is great on our stroller that doesn’t have storage for parents. It does have a zipper pocket. I wish it zipped across the whole entire thing closing it, but it doesn’t and thus why 4 stars. The cup holders are sturdy and able to hold stainless steel cups. It closes well when I fold the stroller and has string Velcro to keep it attached. It does the job but definelty still has an aftermarket add on feel.
customer_reviews.author: Chris brookshire

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with City Select Lux
customer_reviews.text: I read one or two reviews that said this works for the City Select Lux, but they must be referring to the older model stroller. I have the 2017 Lux and this doesn’t work with my model, due to the placement of the break on the handle bar. Also, you wouldn’t be able to fit a cup in the cup holders with the top seat on. Too crowded. Other that that, though, I found the product itself to be of good quality, especially for the price. That’s why I still gave it a 3 star. Would be a great option for other strollers.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C.

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient. It fit perfect. I like the color a lot. It blends in and isn’t a pop out piece on my stroller. For reference I have the evenflo pivot. I’ll upload a pic soon! Love it. It’s just what I needed because my stroller only has a wimpish cup holder. Love this buy. And so affordable
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Well made attractive accessory
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this organizer! I purchased it to go with the Hauck TOGfit Pet Roadster that I just purchased for my dog. The organizer is sturdy, well made, has a zipper pouch on the one side and has room for two drink bottles. The Velcro straps just attach to the handlebar of the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Journeyhawk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Diono Buggy Buddy Stroller Organizer for my dog stroller. I needed a little place to place my phone, water bottle and keys. Gives you a lot of room for extra stuff. Perfect fit, lightweight, flexible, and durable. I am able to keep it attached to my dog stroller nicely even when i fold the stroller up. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tulip & Lola

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and great price
customer_reviews.text: Some other attachments are so expensive. This is great she for the value! My water bottle doesn't fit it the plastic one on the strollers, but since this is elastic it for right in! Perfectfir what I need! I also have two stroller hooks attached at the same time and everything works!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts for about 4 months with normal use
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for about 4 months, then out of the blue, one of the straps broke and it became pretty much useless after that. We didn't even abuse it or store anything heavy in it. Just a normal sippy cup or coffee cup, a cell phone, and maybe a wallet sometimes. So for about a $5 purchase price, I guess it was worth the 4 months of use, but I definitely would not consider this organizer for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Gymtime

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. I wasn't expecting much, however was pleased with this product. I used it underneath a stroller ledge for additional storage while at Disneyland. It held all the additional things I needed such as a phone, sunscreen, water and my keys inside the little zipper pouch. Very happy with this item, and is actually better than one of the more well known higher priced organizers.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly Hersey

customer_reviews.title: A definite must buy for your umbrella stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this has to add to an umbrella stroller for our Disney trip. I am so thankful I did!! The inside cup pockets held bottle drinks in place perfectly. Loved that I was able to mount my phone, charger, sunglasses, snacks, and much more in it to be easily accessible. Easily folded with stroller!
customer_reviews.author: CKS

customer_reviews.title: Cup holders fit bottles well
customer_reviews.text: So our Graco stroller has a parent tray with two cup holders but those are too bit for some baby bottles. This organizer we put behind the cup holder so we have some baby stuff like bottles at arm level instead of having to bend over and use the bottom bin all the time. Someone commented that the cup holders in the organizer don’t fit a standard coffee cup. In our case we didn’t need it for us because graco already have us cup holders. We needed it for baby stuff and it works well for very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: I’d like to start off saying I was incredibly hesitant to ...
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to start off saying I was incredibly hesitant to purchase this since it looks so small.. just in case someone is scrolling these thinking the same thing. This blew my mind! I took it to Disneyland and had zero problems holding larger drinks plus snacks. This thing is surprisingly sturdy for being a small collapsible organizer. It has Velcro straps for attachment so it attached to my stroller with serious ease and perfection. I’m very impressed !!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Only held up for 3 months of barely any use
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item on my stroller. Until I didn’t. I only used it for 3 months maybe twice a week. Kept it attached to the stroller and then one day I saw it hanging by a thread on one side and it ended up ripping that same day. The only things I ever put in it were my phone and keys and sometimes a burp cloth or pacifier. Wish it had held up for a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie N

customer_reviews.title: Go Ahead and Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, I'll admit. For $5, how good could this thing really be? Well, I was proven wrong. It has been great! I actually have another one that was $35, and I feel like this fits my City Select stroller better (works on my City Mini, too). Great cup holders (fits my Yeti), and I like the big open pocket in the middle for snacks, my phone/headphones and keys. The zipper pocket is great for smaller items like hand sanitizer. Loving it so far! The only reason I gave four stars for durability, is that I have only had it for a week thus far. I will update it as time goes on!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Holds all the essentials.....
customer_reviews.text: My $400+ stroller didn't come with a caddy to hold drinks or items and after spending that much on a stroller it was frustrating to have to spend more money. I bought this not sure it would even work but needed something for a trip to Chicago for the Bears 100 years celebration. This caddy was perfect, holding coffee, jack and coke, phones, waters....and the highlight of the trip was when it held 2 beers and a whole box of popcorn! My Bob has very wide handlebars but it fit perfectly!! Not bad for $10!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer.1

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Joovy Caboose which unfortunately has no adult storage or cup orders. I originally had planned to purchase the Joovy Caboose stroller organizer which is designed specifically for our stroller. However, I stumbled upon this Diono holder that was $15 cheaper and had the velcro straps that were adjustable instead of the neoprene sleeve that the Joovy holder has. There are two actual cup holders in the carrier that comfortable fit bottles and cups, as well as an area in the middle that's perfect for my iPhone, snacks for the boys, small toys, rocks/leaves/worms they find on walks! We love this holder and would recommend it again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Randy & Robin

customer_reviews.title: Will Serve its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I misplaced my more expensive stroller caddy. I purchased this one because of the price. It goes on okay. The velcro doesn't look that sturdy. It has okay room for items. The thing I don't like the most though is that it seems like it will very easily tip over when we use it on our trip. The straps aren't as big as they should be to be secure.
customer_reviews.author: melissaM

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Straps torn after only one week of having then they sent me a replacement and one of the straps from that one torn. I didn’t even have a lot of stuff in it just my keys, phone and a small water bottle. It’s supposed to be able to hold so much more than that smh I didn’t bother to return.
customer_reviews.author: Wenonah

customer_reviews.title: Convient Caddy for Chicco Liteway Plus
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this a few weeks and used the stroller a few times but it has made a huge difference going out! I know have a convenient place for my drink and my son's drinks. It's also nice to keep your keys and cell phone. It has made a world of a difference and makes going out much more pleasant. No need to stash things in the undercarriage or digging stuff out of my bag.
customer_reviews.author: genefejs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We have a Maclaren special needs umbrella type stroller and it doesn't have any storage features at all. Got this and it works perfectly for drinks, keys, wallet, and phone. Very sturdy, keeps large stainless cups in place, no spilling. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JESSE WINTERS

customer_reviews.title: Bob Revolution Flex 3.0
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is perfect for the Bob Revolution Flex 3.0. It fits just as it should and although the velcro straps are not very wide it does not swing as I run, even over uneven surfaces. I was a bit nervous about how well my bottles would stay in as I use tall sports bottles but the compartments that hold the bottles have a bit of stretch and hold bottles well. This is such a great value, the red stitching and logo even match the red details on my stroller, it looks like part of the stroller!
customer_reviews.author: cnd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this stroller organizer! Strong but also small velcro straps. I was nervous it wouldn't fit well with my umbrella stroller but it's just perfect! Time will tell (test of time) but so far so good! Sleek and feels premium.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Keep this permanently on the stroller
customer_reviews.text: It's so useful! Doesn't get in the way, holds its shape, and collapses flat with the stroller so no need to remove it. Holds a lot of stuff like phones, keys, wallet, drinks, dog bags, flashlight, burp cloths. This thing doesn't get in the way and is easily accessible whenever you need something. Also kind of blends in with the stroller so you forget it's even there until you need it
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Just added it to my Maclaren Volo and looks good! Fits nicely, excellent price, and doesn't interfere with my stroller in any way (opening or closing). I chose this one because it was really basic and didn't look like it would tip my stroller over. If you are looking for something fancy, this will probably disappoint....BUT if you are looking for a basic cup holder + tray to add to an umbrella stroller, this is exactly that. We'll see how it goes, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Casey W.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my BOB double jogging stroller. I put it on the corner so it’s off to the side and my drink cup won’t hit the handle bar. At first I worried it was too small but it easier holds my drink, a toddler cup, keys, phone, and garage door opener. This has made walks much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Wood

customer_reviews.title: Can be used for adults too!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the kayak, we can put our cell phone, a drink, and some snacks in it while we kayak. Got this idea from someone on Facebook, it works great (as long as you have something to hook it to on the front of your kayak).
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Such a good deal
customer_reviews.text: We have a Joovy Qool stroller, and their stroller organizer is rather expensive for what it is. We are glad to have found this one. It is sturdy, holds phone, burp cloth, bottle, keys, zoo map, small water bottle.. just surprising how much can actually fit. Great product at a great price. No problems and we use it every day for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to stroller
customer_reviews.text: I have this organizer attached the Summer Infant 3D Lite stroller and it is the best thing ever! The cupholders on this are perfect for both sippy cups and Starbucks cups. I use the middle section to place my phone, keys, pacifiers,anything else I need to grab quickly. I like that it has the zipper pocket as well. The straps are very durable. I've pulled and tugged the stroller holding onto this as leverage and it held on allowing me to wiggle the stroller out of my trunk. Definitely recommend this organizer and would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as extra storage
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my camp chair, which I love, but does not come with a great drink holder, never mind any other storage. This is durable, holds more than one drink, if needed, room for my cell phone, a snack, or many other options. Actually went back and ordered a second one for another chair.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Burns

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't go wrong. I'm currently using this on my walker since I had foot surgery. You can put two beverages in it, and there's still room in the middle for phones/snacks/toys whatever you would want. I got an XL Dunkin Donuts cup in the holder no problem. I assume it works great on a stroller too.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy, and quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is was a life saver for our Disney trip, it allowed for any size cup or bottle we put in it. Very strong Velcro, I never once in a week of folding and unfolding the stroller had to readjust the straps. This is a must for a stroller in need of space. In the summertime stroller, I placed it between the handles and it still allowed for folding and unfolding.
customer_reviews.author: Elena S.

customer_reviews.title: So I'm not sure what caused it to pull away like that. I tried to see if I could ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my Bumbleride Flyer and it fit perfectly. However after just a couple months of using it, the seams on the inside started pulling away and the lining started getting exposed. I'm not sure how it happened as I never even put anything heavy in it, usually just my phone and keys. So I'm not sure what caused it to pull away like that. I tried to see if I could fix it but decided against it (as I might damage it even more), anyway it still works fine and there's no actual damage or anything, I'm just annoyed knowing that it happened haha.
customer_reviews.author: Raissa

customer_reviews.title: Its a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I almost bought a few different ones before this but I'm glad I chose this one. Its inexpensive and does exactly what i need. Its not overkill so its never in my way. It doesnt dump out its contents when i fold up the stroller (not even once). It hasnt frayed or ripped and I use it alot. I 100% recommend it if you just need a simple storage spot.
customer_reviews.author: Magic batch

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to our simple stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to our stroller. Has two separate portions for your cups/bottles and enough space in between to put your phone/wallet etc. It is light and the Velcro bands are able to keep it in place with no issue. May not be as sturdy as a built in storage but seems to be holding well so far.
customer_reviews.author: egi

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our small umbrella stroller that does not have much storage. I put it on the stroller and used it once and all I had in there was my phone. It has already started ripping where the straps meet the actual basket part. It seems like the straps are barely sewed on. The storage in it is nice, but it is already falling apart and nothing heavy was even in it. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: Misleading measurements!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 2 star because the dimension information was wrong. It says it is 27 inches in length however the caddy is only 12 inches long. If I measure it from the end of velcro on both sides it still doesn’t come anywhere close to 27 inches. I ordered it based on the length and it’s very short for me. I will be doing a return. If you are looking for a small caddy this one is built nice and feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Najib Husain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome organizer
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this orgsnizer is great. The price is especially enticing and works well. There's a zip pouch in the middle compartment and two cup holders. The velcro holds well so you don't have to worry about it coming undone.
customer_reviews.author: Rheeza Mañalac

customer_reviews.title: good quiality/buena calidad
customer_reviews.text: small, compact and good quality it was what i was looking for, this bag surprised me, i got it for the price and is pretty good, the cup holder are very solid. i really recommend. my stroller is the pivot travel system the Evenflo.
customer_reviews.author: anthony c.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This fits great on my Baby Jogger City Premier. The Velcro is repositionable and doesn't get in the way. There's room for an iced coffee, a sippy cup, a phone, a binky, and keys, plus a little more! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to go on my Graco DuoGlider stroller because I needed more room to put my phone, keys, sunglasses, etc. and the stroller's built in features weren't enough. It fits great! Easy to install and secure, and perfectly holds everything I just mentioned. I already had hooks attached to my stroller, so I just attached the Buggy Buddy right above the hooks. If I removed the hooks or moved them up so the Buggy Buddy hung down a little lower, I think you would have plenty of room to also put drinks in it. It is well made and the drink-holding areas are elasticized to hold your drink securely.
customer_reviews.author: KDF

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with Uppababy Minu
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes that this would work on our Uppababy Minu, sadly it did not. It was unstable and kept slipping. I ended up ordering the Uppababy stroller organizer and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Madison’s mama

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy and nice size. Has good hardy Velcro straps. Great for 2 sippy cups, phone, tickets, and keys. Used on a trip on my stroller but will be great for my portable wagon. Would recommend to you if you are considering buying.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Truman

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as an “add on” item for $6. It’s been the perfect addition to my citi mini GT which did not come with anything for parents on the handlebar. 2 cup holders and a middle section big enough to fit keys, a snack for my toddler, and my phone with plenty of room to spare. Glad I didn’t waste my money on a different brand which cost 3 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: First one broke, second one broke...
customer_reviews.text: First one broke where the strap connects to the holder. Amazon quickly sent a replacement, which also broke in the same exact place. The stitching is weak at this fail point, clearly. The holder itself seems high quality, but if it keeps breaking and falling off your stroller, it's kind of useless.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great extra storage
customer_reviews.text: This has been such a helpful holder. We can fit 2 large drinks on each side, & carry a snack container as well as our phones & keys in the middle. I've used this on our stroller, trike, & umbrella stroller with no problems. It's easily adjustable. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Stroller Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, inexpensive option for a stroller organizer. I have a BOB jogging stroller, which doesn't come standard with a drink holder or any type of organization area besides the basket underneath. This was easy for me to hook on my stroller and has been easy to use and keep everything I need organized and accessible. So far, I have only used the drink holder to carry a water bottle. It has down a good job for that, but it might not be a great option if you are trying to carry something like a small paper coffee cup.
customer_reviews.author: LPearson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Iv seen some like this one at other stores super expensive and this one is very nice and plenty of space my baby’s stroller didn’t come with any storage and this is what i needed for my drinks and cellphone
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Borrowed an umbrella stroller for our Disney trip, but it didn't have a drink holder so I ordered this. It worked really well and is collapsible for easy storage. Doesn't hold a lot of stuff, but it's perfect for a couple bottles and a few other items.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Roth

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Works great with my stroller. I wanted this to hold my phone and keys because the little compartment on the stroller handles was really small. I can put everything I need right away without pulling out my diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Toddler can flip this like it’s nobody’s business
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our double Joovy stroller. I still can’t decide if it’s better than nothing. You can’t put anything spill-able in it (coffee, drink with star, etc) pretty much just a water bottle. It absolutely drives me nuts when my toddler tries and succeeds to flip stuff out of it; it’s hanging right above his head so it’s super tempting. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Such a steal for $6, it was on sale and for the price I can't complain. We use it for our summer infant 3D lite stroller. It is very sturdy, well made and can easily hold two to three of our heavy stainless steel bottles, moblie phones, keys and more. Easy to strap on and holds the weight well. We also don't need to take it off while folding the stroller, doesn't get in the way. All in all, I'm happy with the purchase. Please hit thumbs up if my review helped you make a decision.
customer_reviews.author: Ani Pan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, durable, a great value!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this heavily for almost 2 years now with our Chicco Liteway stroller and it looks the same as the day I bought it. It has never fallen off, it takes a ton of abuse from holding phones, multiple drinks, rocks and sticks my son picks up on our walks, etc. It's a fantastic value and I highly recommend it for anyone that wants a simple contraption to hold some basics that won't be too heavy for a lightweight stroller. I also have never had to take it off to fold our stroller so that is a major plus!
customer_reviews.author: Clever Candy Reads

customer_reviews.title: Fits Summer Infant 3-D Convenience Stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful stroller organizer!! It fits perfectly on my Summer Infant 3-D Convenience stroller! It fits 2 large drinks in the drink holders, and I love that it has a zippered section! I highly recommend this organizer! Please mark if you find my review helpful. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: PeggyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: So helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Great for walks! Perfect size for just throwing my keys, wallet, phone & a water bottle or two. I just attach it to any stroller I’m using & we’re good to go. Amazing price point & super convenient. So happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Elle Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Best value for a stroller caddy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a workhorse. It collapses easily for folding up the stroller. I have it on my mountain buggy nano. It blends well and looks like it was meant to be there. The only con is that it’s not the best for holding drinks upright. The skip hop caddy is better for that.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Folds up with my stroller
customer_reviews.text: We bought this stroller organizer to fit the Mountain Buggy Nano. Although I read other customer reviews saying that you cannot fold strollers while this stroller organizer is still attached, I can fold it attached to the Nano without any issue (I empty the organizer first, of course) and the Nano still fits in the bag it came with while folded with the organizer. We basically use the organizer to store a water bottle or drink for us, the baby's bottle and our phones. It is a great addition to our Mountain Buggy Nano so we may end up buying another one for our Bugaboo.
customer_reviews.author: poohbearplace

customer_reviews.title: Broke very easily
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well for about a week and a half, and then one of the handles broke. I’m sure I could sew it back on, but it’s just a little bit of a hassle to have to do so.
customer_reviews.author: ashley newman

customer_reviews.title: Exercise bike storage basket
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my stationary exercise bike. It works great to hold small items within hands reach, such as the remote control, a bottled water, cell phone etc. Attaches easily to handlebars with adjustable Velcro straps. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Oliverpugg

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Is s very light and with a lot of space, if you put items too heavy it kind of deforms but i love the fact that has a pocket with a zip for the wallet. anything essential will fit and for the price you pay is great. easy to attach with the velcro straps, will works with any stroller
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: You really can't go wrong with this item for the price. I needed something to hold on my phone & drinks. Some of the stroller organizers are way to expensive in my perspective. This does the job and no regrets buying it. But it's hard to place drinks unless it's bottled drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: Fits stroller and compact for storage.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition for storage on our stroller. We also used it while on family vacation (including shoving in rental cars, luggage, and airplanes) and it held up well. It holds just the right amount of items without being too cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for one stroller, semi-perfect on our jogger
customer_reviews.text: We have the Graco Click Connect system, and this works great on the stroller than came with the car seat-lots of room for drinks and you can reach in and out easily, but on the Click Connect jogger the handle is much wider and so this sits too close to the stroller itself for drinks/water bottles but will still hold a phone and wipes and a diaper no problem. Easy to put on (velcro!) and easy to wash too. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandilyn Brown

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a few different "name brand" cup holders for our stroller and they were awful. They literally all broke within the first couple uses... I ordered this just this just to see how it did and I have been using it for a couple months now and its been a game changer! lots of space to easily throw in your wallet, phone, keys, and still room for two drinks! sturdy but not bulky! def recommend especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a stroller organizer for my GB Pockit Plus stroller and this worked perfectly! I was worried about it being too big for such a small stroller but as you can tell by the picture, it’s a perfect fit! Great value, great buy, I couldn’t be happier!

customer_reviews.title: Fits on Chicco caddy
customer_reviews.text: This fits on my Chicco snap n go caddy. I attach it in front of the cup holders that are part of the caddy. I didn’t like the one that’s part of the caddy. This allows me to put 2 skinny water bottles and my wallet, keys, etc inside for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: TAnderson

customer_reviews.title: It works for uppababy Cruz 2018!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy the $34 uppababy organizer but I saw this for less than $6, I bought it despite other people said it doesn’t work. But it works (you just need to twist the Velcro) and it fits a 500 ml size bottle! I am happy. Now I can watch Netflix while walking with my baby!
customer_reviews.author: Umbrelala

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great, is pretty sturdy (doesn't get floppy), and fits well on my Summer Infant Flip stroller. Stays in place while the stroller is folded, too. I like the sleek, low profile color and design. The cupholder sections aren't huge (a water bottle fits fine, probably maximum size would be a "medium" sized soft drink cup...I cannot fit my 24-oz silicone sleeved Lifefactory glass bottle in them), but we often use the bigger middle section for larger cups/bottles.
customer_reviews.author: B.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after the cupholder on my umbrella stroller kept breaking this one is great ! you can take it off and wash it it holds a lot and it folds well when you fold the stroller
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Diono
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one of these about 10 years ago for our first child's stroller. Used it for our 2nd child, and now we just purchased another for our 3rd child because silly me, I disposed of it when we got rid of our stroller. That's how durable and useful this was. 10 years after first purchased, I remembered the brand and the item and knew I'd need it again. Don't doubt the need and usefulness of this item.
customer_reviews.author: dawell escotto

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my needs. I usually use a mug for to go which is bigger than the cup holder, but it stil lworks when placed in the middle. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Needed some space for my stroller and refused pay 25 usd for the original Uppa baby stroller pocket. This is the same, everybody is making it in China. Works well, looks good. No difference. It holds coffee cups, phone, baby stuff, It’s not huge, all overall happy with it and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ajna Kenning

customer_reviews.title: The best, most economical stroller organizer.
customer_reviews.text: The whole thing is a sturdy, black fabric, so it's so soft and does not impede folding of stroller. The two cup holders, one on either side are also made of fabric so that they are flexible and you can put something larger in the large middle compartment just by collapsing one of both of the cup holders. There is also a zippered pouch in the large middle compartment for credit card or cash. Looks great and is highly functional. I bought two, one for my City Mini and one for my Summer 3D travel umbrella stroller. Another reviewer posted a list of all the strollers this is compatible with.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Yasui

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for biking around. Plenty of room for personal things and a very small, half bottle of water. Not enough room for a standard bottle of water.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy straps
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this while it worked. Spacious, easy to put on and take off. Unfortunately, the seam where the straps are is rather flimsy, and tore after 6 months of moderate use. I'll be purchasing a replacement with thicker and sturdier straps.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Also offers zipper pouch in main compartment which is just great for separating loose stuff
customer_reviews.text: Very well made for the price. The two bottle holders on the sides are held in by slightly giving neoprene which works well to insulate (to a degree) and hold them in snug. Also offers zipper pouch in main compartment which is just great for separating loose stuff. Fit very well on Uppababy Vista and Cruz
customer_reviews.author: J. Yee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m very glad I purchased this storage for my stroller. It’s not big and billet it’s a great size fur snacks, phones, toys, and it also can hold drinks. I definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best value I've seen.
customer_reviews.text: The long Velcro straps make it likely to fit varying stroller handle widths. It has 2 cup holders plus space in the middle. It easily holds 2 diapers and a pack of wipes, or some snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Long

customer_reviews.title: Practical, Sturdy, Aesthetically Pleasing.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a second one of these for my double stroller. It’s very sturdy and practical. It has a nice clean aesthetic and matches my stroller well.
customer_reviews.author: T&L17

product_meta.title: Diono Buggy Buddy, Stroller Organizer, Black
product_meta.description: Buggy Buddy keeps all your essentials organized and within reach when you’re out for a walk. With its zippered pocket for valuables, insulated drink holders and insulated cargo bin, it’s the perfect way to carry snacks, drinks and everything else.
feature_bullets: ORGANIZE ON THE GO - The Buggy Buddy stroller organizer keeps parents’ essentials organized and accessible on the go
MULTI-PURPOSE STORAGE - Features 2 insulated drinks holders keep’s drinks extra cool and zippered mesh pocket to keep valuables secure
UNIVERSAL FIT - Compatible with everything from ultra-compact strollers to full size travel systems
EASY HOOK & LOOP ATTACHMENT - Buggy Buddy easily attaches to stroller handles with hook and loop fasteners
AWARD WINNING - The Buggy Buddy Stroller Organizer has received the LBP award from Loved by Parents, a family-focused online parenting magazine

specifications.Additional product features: Features 2 insulated drinks holders keep’s drinks extra cool and zippered mesh pocket to keep valuables secure
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,757 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
